sentences.en: He now finds the same village almost unrecognizable in its lushness.
sentences.cn: 这次,他发现当年的那座村庄已经郁郁葱葱,几乎认不出来了.

sentences.en: He was unrecognizable without his beard.
sentences.cn: 他刮掉胡子，无人认得出他了。

sentences.en: His color rose to a heated red and his face was virtually unrecognizaBle.
sentences.cn: 他的脸通红,变得几乎让人认不出来了.

sentences.en: His speech was difficult to understand, his signature shaky and unrecognizable.
sentences.cn: 他的演说很难听懂，他的签名颤颤巍巍地无法识别。

sentences.en: I hadn’t been to the city for 20 years and it was almost unrecognizable.
sentences.cn: 我已经 20 年没有到过这座城市，几乎认不出来了。

sentences.en: In our code, we scrambled letters so words are unrecognizable.
sentences.cn: 在密码中, 我们把字母排列顺序打乱使得单调无法辩认.

sentences.en: People are normally quiet and pleasant may become unrecognizable when are behind a steering - wheel.
sentences.cn: 平常很安详愉快的人一坐在方向盘后可能就变得难以认识.

sentences.en: People are normally quiet and pleasant may become unrecognizable when are behind a steering wheel.
sentences.cn: 平时安静的人一开车马上变得让人认不出.

sentences.en: People who are normally quiet and pleasant may become unrecognizable when they are behind a steering - wheel.
sentences.cn: 平常很安详快乐的人,一坐在方向盘之后就变得难以认识了.

sentences.en: She was unrecognizable because of the poorness of the photography.
sentences.cn: 由于照片照得不好,所以无法认出她.

sentences.en: The car was unrecognizable and one side of the house was destroyed.
sentences.cn: 汽车撞得稀烂,房子的一侧也受到的严重损坏.

sentences.en: The corpses of the prisoners were nearly unrecognizable from the number of bullet wounds they'd received.
sentences.cn: 囚犯的尸体上中枪太多，几乎无法辨认。

sentences.en: The unrecognizable remains of a man had been found.
sentences.cn: 一具无法辨认的男性尸体被发现了。

sentences.en: There are many unrecognizable parts in this passage.
sentences.cn: 这段文字中存在很多误码,根本无法读懂.

sentences.en: Truly speaking, unrecognizable sweet it all is.
sentences.cn: 确切地说, 它全都是种不可辨认的美妙.

sentences.en: Unrecognizable identified or text string in SET command.
sentences.cn: SET命令中包含不能识别的标记符或文本串.

words.tran_cn: 未被承认的；无法认出的

trans.tran_cn: （人或事物）变得[损坏得]难以辨认的，无法识别的
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is unrecognizable has changed or been damaged so much that you do not recognize them
